body:
Comment 4 by **itmitica**: 
Simpler example, as per specs:
http://golang.org/ref/spec#Assignments

package main

func main() {
	{
		x := []int{1, 2, 3}
		i := 0
		i, x[i] = 1, 2 // set i = 1, x[0] = 2
	}

	{
		x := map[int]int{0: 1, 1: 2, 2: 3}
		i := 0
		i, x[i] = 1, 2 // set i = 1, x[1] = 2
	}
}
